sentences.english: The cook baked a cake . The cake was baked too long. The cake is as hard as rock.
sentences.chinese: 廚子烤了一塊餅，烤餅的時間太長了，硬得像石頭。

sentences.english: Add the sugar and salt, stir well, and then add the buttermilk to form a loose, scone-type mixture.
sentences.chinese: 加糖和鹽，攪拌均勻，再加入牛奶形成鬆鬆的烤餅狀。

sentences.english: To make scones you will need 50g of butter.
sentences.chinese: 做烤餅你將需要50克的黃油。

sentences.english: If you do not have a waffle iron, just use a fry pan and cook like a pancake.
sentences.chinese: 若沒有華夫鐵板，可用煎鍋代替，象做薄烤餅那樣。

sentences.english: Crumpets are buttered whole and then cut before eating.
sentences.chinese: 喫烤餅時先要整體塗滿黃油，食用前再切開。

sentences.english: Enjoy Korea Royal Cuisine Dinner with experience to make Korean Kimchi pan cake.
sentences.chinese: 體驗製作泡菜烤餅，然後享用韓式宮廷御宴韓定食。

sentences.english: I would like to sell tea and scones from England.
sentences.chinese: 我將出售英國的茶和烤餅。

sentences.english: No scones , but I've fresh bread which is just as good.
sentences.chinese: 沒有烤餅，但我有一些新鮮的麪包，也是同樣不錯的。

sentences.english: Of course. I'll teach you how to make scones.
sentences.chinese: 當然我會教你怎樣做烤餅。

sentences.english: You can also make raisin scones.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以做葡萄乾烤餅。

sentences.english: The food will be scones and the drink will be tea.
sentences.chinese: 食品將是烤餅，飲料將是茶。

sentences.english: Ms Grace was munching a toasted crumpet beside her Ferrari.
sentences.chinese: 格蕾絲女士當時正在她的法拉利旁大嚼烤餅。

sentences.english: When it was my time to order I asked the waitress to bring some jam with my scone.
sentences.chinese: 到我選擇時，我要求女服務員給我的烤餅來一點果醬。

sentences.english: The baker somewhere between a scones and a cookie.
sentences.chinese: 麪包師表示這種小喫既有點像烤餅，又有點像曲奇。

sentences.english: The baker says the snack is somewhere between a scones and a cookie.
sentences.chinese: 麪包師表示這種小喫既有點像烤餅，又有點像曲奇。

definition: rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
see 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3]
